backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing video sharing platform with user profiles, video uploads, likes, comments, follows, and messaging; includes storage and authorization mixins with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three delete video features: trash icon in VideoCard, delete functionality with confirmation dialog, and trash icon in VideoGrid thumbnails for authenticated users' own videos.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the video sharing application with neon-themed UI.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including neon-inspired colors and custom styling for borders and backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SkelUlt application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for feed, profile, video detail, and messaging pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/ChatThread.tsx: Chat thread component displaying message history with recipient header, scrollable message list with auto-scroll on new messages, and message input form.
frontend/src/components/CommentInput.tsx: Comment input form component with textarea and submit button that posts comments to videos with authentication check and loading states.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Scrollable comment section displaying comment list with author avatars, usernames, timestamps, and comment text with loading state and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/ConversationList: Displays a scrollable list of conversation partners with avatars, usernames, last message previews, and timestamps. Includes loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileModal: Modal dialog for editing user profile including username, bio, and profile picture upload with image preview. Handles form validation and profile save mutations.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Toggle button for following/unfollowing users with optimistic UI updates, loading states, and validation to prevent self-following.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header containing logo, navigation buttons (home, upload, messages, profile), theme toggle, and login button. Includes footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Heart-shaped like button with optimistic UI updates, displays like count, and prevents duplicate likes with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity, with loading indicators and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Chat message bubble component with different styling for own vs. received messages, displays timestamp, and includes optional video link with navigation.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message composition area with textarea, send button, video attachment picker, and keyboard shortcuts (Enter to send). Handles message sending with video links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to create their profile with username (required) and bio (optional) fields. Submits profile data using the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook and displays toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Button component that copies a video's URL to the clipboard when clicked. Uses the Share2 icon and displays toast notifications for success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card component displaying video with thumbnail/player, uploader info, metadata (likes, comments, upload time), and interactive elements (like, share, delete). Navigates to video detail page on click and supports deletion for own videos with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/VideoGrid.tsx: Grid layout component displaying videos as thumbnails with play overlay and delete button for own videos. Handles navigation to video detail pages and deletion with confirmation dialog.
Dialog component that displays a user's uploaded videos in a grid for selection. Used to pick videos to share in messages, with loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploadModal: Modal dialog for uploading videos with form fields for title, description, tags, and video file selection. Handles file validation, upload progress tracking, and form submission using the useUploadVideo hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically recreates the actor when identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, videos (upload, fetch, delete), comments, likes, follows, and messaging with optimistic updates and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with neon-inspired light/dark theme using OKLCH color space, custom utility classes for neon glow effects, gradients, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays a feed of most-liked videos with VideoCard components, shows loading states, handles empty states, and triggers ProfileSetupModal for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/pages/MessagingPage.tsx: Implements a two-column messaging interface with ConversationList and ChatThread components, requiring authentication and redirecting unauthenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile information with avatar, bio, stats, and video grid; supports editing own profile and following other users based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/VideoDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed video page with video player, uploader info, like/share buttons, and comments section. Fetches video data, uploader profile, and comments using custom hooks and provides navigation back to feed or to uploader's profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, neon-themed box shadows, custom border radii, animations, and typography/container query plugins for the social media platform's vibrant UI.
project_state.json: Project state document describing SkelUlt as a unified social media video platform with implemented features including authentication, profiles, video upload/feed, likes, comments, sharing, and follow system, with a known issue about missing video deletion buttons.
